review: Love our fire tv! The voice search is spot on and is so much faster than one Blu Ray player.

review: Great addititon for TVs that don't have these functions built in. In fact, given the price and performance, if I have to replace either of my newer larger panels, I'll probably opt for "dumb" and add another Amazon Fire TV unit to the house.

review: I'm having issues with it turning on every time and the controller going through batteries quickly.  When it works, it is great.

review: I even had an amazon tech help me set the Fire TV up and it would not work.  We will return it, but the only thing the tec could blame the speed of our internet was not fast enough.  THIS WAS OUR BIG FAMILY CHRISTMAS GIFT, SO WE WERE VERY DISAPPOINTED

review: With amazon prime it worked great.  The parental controles are useless.  It should require password if rating is R or higher or cost money.  Requiring it all the time makes it unuseable.
